summary: YHE is a six year old post potter canon site that is a combination of Rowling Canon and our own. It is a site created by fans...
body:
YHE is a six year old post potter canon site that is a combination of Rowling Canon and our own. It is a site created by fans and built upon by fans. We are set in 2028. Focused on the United Kingdom with locations all over England, Ireland, Scotland and soon Wales. Plots are character driven with monthly events that offer a way to meet new people with no effort. The more members we have the more locations we will add. We have no word count and a shipper app with relaxed activity rules. If you have an idea you have wanted to try in the HP world we are the place for you to do that.

Come and check us out!

Home | Alias Sorting | Face Claims | Job Claims | Want Ads | Discord

tags: harry potter and the goblet of fire
summary: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire - J. K. Rowling
title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire - J. K. Rowling
body:
“If you want to know what a man’s like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals”

Mon petit frère Louis est né alors que je lisais La Coupe de Feu pour la première fois. Je me souviens encore de mon père nous conduisant sur la route de la maternité, avec RTL2 en fond sonore, et moi en train d’essayer de lire mon livre à la lumière des lampadaires qui bordaient la route. Onze ans plus tard, Louis a lu tous les Harry Potter et les adore autant que moi, il a même acheté un jeu de cartes à l’effigie de la saga pendant un voyage scolaire en Angleterre, et moi je me replonge dans La Coupe de Feu en pensant à tout ça. 



Qu’est-ce que ça raconte ? 

Après quelques semaines caractérisées par l’ennui chez les Dursley, Harry est invité par les Weasley à aller voir la coupe du monde de Quidditch avec eux. Il n’hésite bien sûr pas un instant, et quelques jours plus tard assiste à un match de professionnels pour la première fois de sa vie. Il en est émerveillé, mais son bonheur est bien vite mis à mal par l’intervention d’anciens partisans de Voldemort. L’accident perturbe le monde des sorciers, mais il est bien vite oublié quand il est annoncé lors de la rentrée à Poudlard qu’aurait lieu le Tournoi des Trois Sorciers. 

Suite à un concours de circonstances, Harry Potter devient le champion de son école au même titre que Cédric Diggory. 

Trois épreuves des plus difficiles l’attendent, et le monde des sorciers a une énième fois les yeux sur Harry Potter…Un sorcier en particulier semble s’intéresser grandement à son cas, pour le plus grand malheur des sorciers du monde entier. 


Avec La Coupe de Feu, la série Harry Potter prend vraisemblablement un tournant beaucoup plus sombre. Les révélations concernant les Mangemorts, les sorts et les tortures qu’ils ont fait subir aux Moldus comme aux sorciers, la mort violente de Cédric Diggory, un jeune sorcier prometteur que tous aimaient et respectaient, et la promesse d’un avenir sombre que le Ministre n’a pas l’air de vouloir prendre au sérieux. 

Loin des premiers tomes où l’on s’émerveillait face aux créatures magiques, malgré une dimension fantastique encore très présente pendant le Tournoi qui apporte son lot de surprises et de mystères, on se retrouve ici embourbé dans des histoires de trahison et de fidélité, de meurtres et de tortures indescriptibles, de corruption et d’inefficacité politique. Ceci est annonciateur des prochains livres et du dénouement de la saga. 

J’ai toujours bien aimé ce tome, cet ouvrage de transition entre deux périodes de la vie de Harry, du monde des sorciers, de Poudlard. Ma dernière lecture n’a pas changé mon opinion sur La Coupe de Feu, j’aime toujours autant assister à l’arrivée des élèves de Durmstrang et Beauxbâtons, aux épreuves du Tournoi, mais quel choc inévitable lorsque Cédric est assassiné, écarté comme un vulgaire obstacle, lui dont on nous dressait un portrait si prometteur !


Vous voulez l’acheter ? J’avais repéré cette magnifique édition à la boutique 9 ¾ de King’s Cross, et j’ai commandé l’ensemble des livres sur Amazon.

summary: For Italians that want to improve their English and for English people that want to improve their Italian  Harry Potter and the...
caption:
For Italians that want to improve their English and for English people that want to improve their Italian 

Harry Potter and the cursed child. The play 

Part 1 Act one Scene one: 

A busy and crowded station, full of people trying to go somewhere. Amongst the hustle and bustle, two large cages rattle on top of two laden trolleys. They’re being pushed by two boys, James Potter and Albus Potter. Their mother, Ginny, follows after. A thirty-seven-years-old man, Harry, has his daughter Lily on his shoulders. 

Albus: Dad. He keeps saying it

Harry: James, give it a rest.

James: I only said he might be in Slytherin. And he might, so … (off his dad’s glare) fine. 

Albus (looking up at his mum): You’ll write to me, won’t you?

Ginny: Everyday if you want us to.

Albus: No. Not everyday. James says most people only get letters from home about once a month. I don’t want to …

Harry: We wrote to your brother three times a week last year. 

Albus: What? James!

Albus looks accusingly at James.

Ginny: Yes. You may not want to belive everything he tells you about Hogwarts. He likes a laugh, your brother.

James (with a grin): Can we go now please?

Albus looks at his dad, and then his mum.

Ginny: All you have to do is walk straight at the wall between platforms nine and ten.

Lily: I’m so excited.

Harry: Don’t stop and don’t be scared you’ll crash into it, that’s very important. Best to do it at a run if you’re nervous. 

Albus: I’m ready. 

Harry and Lily put their hands on albus’s trolley - Ginny joins James’s trolley - and together, the family run hard into the barrier. 

Traduzione: 

Un’ indaffarata e affollata stazione, piena di gente che sta cercando di andare da qualche parte. In mezzo al trambusto, due grandi gabbie tintinnano sopra a due valigie piene. Sono spinte da due ragazzi, James Potter e Albus Potter. La loro madre, Ginny, li segue. Un trentasettenne, Harry, ha sua figlia Lily sulle spalle. 

Albus: Papà. Continua a dirlo.

Harry: James, dacci un taglio. 

James: Sto solo dicendo che potrebbe (essere) finire nei Serpeverde. E potrebbe, quindi … (dall’ occhiata di suo padre) va bene. 

Albus (guardando sua madre): Mi scriverete, vero? 

Ginny: Tutti i giorni se lo desideri.

Albus: No. Non tutti i giorni. James dice che la maggior parte delle persone riceve lettere da casa una volta al mese. Non voglio …

Harry: Abbiamo scritto a tuo fratello tre volte in una settimana lo scorso anno.

Albus: Cosa? James! 

Albus guarda con fare accusatorio James

Ginny: Si. Faresti meglio a non credere a tutto quello che ti dice su Hogwarts. Gli piace scherzare a tuo fratello. 

James (con un ghigno): Possiamo andare ora, per piacere?

Albus guarda suo padre e poi sua madre. 

Ginny: Tutto quello che devi fare è camminare attraverso il muro della piattaforma nove e dieci. 

Lily: Sono così emozionata.

Harry: Non fermarti e non avere paura o ti ci schianterai contro, questo è molto importante. Meglio farlo correndo se sei nervoso.

Albus: Sono pronto. 

Harry e Lily misero le loro mani sul trolley di albus - Ginny le mette sul trolly di James - e insieme la famiglia corre incontro la barriera.

reblog.comment:
For Italians that want to improve their English and for English people that want to improve their Italian 

Harry Potter and the cursed child. The play 

Part 1 Act one Scene one: 

A busy and crowded station, full of people trying to go somewhere. Amongst the hustle and bustle, two large cages rattle on top of two laden trolleys. They’re being pushed by two boys, James Potter and Albus Potter. Their mother, Ginny, follows after. A thirty-seven-years-old man, Harry, has his daughter Lily on his shoulders. 

Albus: Dad. He keeps saying it

Harry: James, give it a rest.

James: I only said he might be in Slytherin. And he might, so … (off his dad’s glare) fine. 

Albus (looking up at his mum): You’ll write to me, won’t you?

Ginny: Everyday if you want us to.

Albus: No. Not everyday. James says most people only get letters from home about once a month. I don’t want to …

Harry: We wrote to your brother three times a week last year. 

Albus: What? James!

Albus looks accusingly at James.

Ginny: Yes. You may not want to belive everything he tells you about Hogwarts. He likes a laugh, your brother.

James (with a grin): Can we go now please?

Albus looks at his dad, and then his mum.

Ginny: All you have to do is walk straight at the wall between platforms nine and ten.

Lily: I’m so excited.

Harry: Don’t stop and don’t be scared you’ll crash into it, that’s very important. Best to do it at a run if you’re nervous. 

Albus: I’m ready. 

Harry and Lily put their hands on albus’s trolley - Ginny joins James’s trolley - and together, the family run hard into the barrier. 

Traduzione: 

Un’ indaffarata e affollata stazione, piena di gente che sta cercando di andare da qualche parte. In mezzo al trambusto, due grandi gabbie tintinnano sopra a due valigie piene. Sono spinte da due ragazzi, James Potter e Albus Potter. La loro madre, Ginny, li segue. Un trentasettenne, Harry, ha sua figlia Lily sulle spalle. 

Albus: Papà. Continua a dirlo.

Harry: James, dacci un taglio. 

James: Sto solo dicendo che potrebbe (essere) finire nei Serpeverde. E potrebbe, quindi … (dall’ occhiata di suo padre) va bene. 

Albus (guardando sua madre): Mi scriverete, vero? 

Ginny: Tutti i giorni se lo desideri.

Albus: No. Non tutti i giorni. James dice che la maggior parte delle persone riceve lettere da casa una volta al mese. Non voglio …

Harry: Abbiamo scritto a tuo fratello tre volte in una settimana lo scorso anno.

Albus: Cosa? James! 

Albus guarda con fare accusatorio James

Ginny: Si. Faresti meglio a non credere a tutto quello che ti dice su Hogwarts. Gli piace scherzare a tuo fratello. 

James (con un ghigno): Possiamo andare ora, per piacere?

Albus guarda suo padre e poi sua madre. 

Ginny: Tutto quello che devi fare è camminare attraverso il muro della piattaforma nove e dieci. 

Lily: Sono così emozionata.

Harry: Non fermarti e non avere paura o ti ci schianterai contro, questo è molto importante. Meglio farlo correndo se sei nervoso.

Albus: Sono pronto. 

Harry e Lily misero le loro mani sul trolley di albus - Ginny le mette sul trolly di James - e insieme la famiglia corre incontro la barriera.

blog.title: hold onto me
blog.description: I don't own any story. I'm not a writer just a reader and all I do is make banners or edits for the ones I like.

summary: James believes in Mothman, he is a huge fan. On each of his jackets he has ine patch with the creature. He alway tries to...
body:
Fun Fact

James believes in Mothman, he is a huge fan. On each of his jackets he has ine patch with the creature. He alway tries to convinced those family members who work in the ministry to seach for the Mothman

title: A Kiss Promised
body:
by Hold_en

When Neville Longbottom creates an enchanted mistletoe in hopes of winning Hannah’s affections, he has no idea of the ramifications of such a creation. Especially on the likes of Hermione Granger and Severus Snape.

A sweet little Christmas ficlet for my beloved readers. Obviously AU.

Words: 1425, Chapters: 1/3, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Hermione Granger, Severus Snape, Harry Potter, Ron Weasley, Ginny Weasley, Hannah Abbott, Neville Longbottom, Minerva McGonagall
  • Relationships: Hermione Granger/Severus Snape, Hannah Abbott/Neville Longbottom, Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley
  • Additional Tags: Christmas, Christmas Fluff, Short, Holidays, Alternate Universe, Dubcon Kissing

Read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CgHQVd

summary: James looked as if he knew he was being tested, and after a moment of I know precisely what this is and I'm choosing to...
body:
James looked as if he knew he was being tested, and after a moment of I know precisely what this is and I’m choosing to entertain it, not because you’ve won, but because I have all the patience in the world, he gradually raised his wand, conjuring a silver stag and speaking into it.

“Sirius,” he said. “Your son is being an obstinate wanker.”

https://m.fanfiction.net/s/12959277/6/
